reach out to the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to

call a taxi, Uber, or someone he knows to get a quick ride to the airport
call for emergency roadside assistance or a taxi while notifying the airline about his situation
call for a taxi, Uber, or other rideshare service as soon as possible to get him to the airport on time
call for emergency roadside assistance or a taxi/ride service to help him get to the airport in time
call a taxi, an Uber or other ride-sharing service
call a taxi, an Uber, or a friend for a ride to the airport

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: double-check all the sales receipts and confirm whether a mistake was meant in recording the transactions

immediately inform his supervisor about the missing money
immediately report the missing money to upper management or the owner, explaining the situation honestly and promising to investigate how it happened to prevent such occurrences in the future
